class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        maxChangeArray = [0 for i in range(k + 1)]
        freqArray = [0 for i in range(k + 1)]
        for i in range(len(nums) // 2):
            diff = abs(nums[i] - nums[len(nums) - i - 1])
            maxChange = max(max(nums[i], nums[len(nums) - i - 1]), k - min(nums[i], nums[len(nums) - i - 1]))
            freqArray[diff] += 1
            maxChangeArray[maxChange] += 1
        ans = len(nums) // 2
        finalAns = math.inf
        for j in range(len(freqArray)):
            finalAns = min(finalAns, ans - freqArray[j])
            ans += maxChangeArray[j]
        return finalAns
